name: SwiftNDNTouchConsumer
summary: This is a NDN consumer model designed for NDN-iOS developers.
description: This implementation is based on Consumer-Producer APIs designed by UCLA developers (https://github.com/named-data/Consumer-Producer-API). Especially, this code include consumer APIs and it is written in Swift3 to be compatible with iOS platforms (above 10.0). Currently, the model includes 4 data retrieval protocols (SDR, UDR, RDR, IDR). The example project uses IDR(Infomax Data Retreival) to transmit image files in the least redundant order.
